trans-unit.source: Provides an example implementation of the <xref href="System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeCompiler"></xref> interface.
<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeCompiler> is a useful utility base class for code generators to derive from in order to provide code compilation functions.
This class contains a link demand and an inheritance demand at the class level that applies to all members.
A <xref:System.Security.SecurityException> is thrown when either the immediate caller or the derived class does not have full-trust permission.
For details about security demands, see [Link Demands](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md) and [Inheritance Demands](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/28b9adbb-8f08-4f10-b856-dbf59eb932d9).
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeCompiler"></xref> class.
Gets the command arguments to be passed to the compiler from the specified <xref href="System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerParameters"></xref>.
A <xref href="System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerParameters"></xref> that indicates the compiler options.
The command arguments.
Gets the name of the compiler executable.
This property indicates the name of the compiler executable to invoke.
The name of the compiler executable.
Gets the file name extension to use for source files.
This property indicates the file name extension of the source files that are to be compiled.
The file name extension to use for source files.
Compiles the specified compile unit using the specified options, and returns the results from the compilation.
A <xref href="System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerParameters"></xref> object that indicates the compiler options.
A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit"></xref> object that indicates the source to compile.
The results of compilation.
options is `null`.
Compiles the specified compile units using the specified options, and returns the results from the compilation.
A <xref href="System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerParameters"></xref> object that indicates the compiler options.
An array of <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit"></xref> objects that indicates the source to compile.
The results of compilation.
options is `null`.
-or-
ea is `null`.
Compiles the specified file using the specified options, and returns the results from the compilation.
A <xref href="System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerParameters"></xref> object that indicates the compiler options.
The file name to compile.
The results of compilation.
options is `null`.
-or-
fileName is `null`.
Compiles the specified files using the specified options, and returns the results from the compilation.
A <xref href="System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerParameters"></xref> object that indicates the compiler options.
An array of strings that indicates the file names of the files to compile.
The results of compilation.
options is `null`.
-or-
fileNames is `null`.
Compiles the specified source code string using the specified options, and returns the results from the compilation.
A <xref href="System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerParameters"></xref> object that indicates the compiler options.
The source code string to compile.
The results of compilation.
options is `null`.
Compiles the specified source code strings using the specified options, and returns the results from the compilation.
A <xref href="System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerParameters"></xref> object that indicates the compiler options.
An array of strings containing the source code to compile.
The results of compilation.
options is `null`.
-or-
sources is `null`.
Gets the command arguments to use when invoking the compiler to generate a response file.
A <xref href="System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerParameters"></xref> object that indicates the compiler options.
A command arguments string.
The command arguments to use to generate a response file, or `null` if there are no response file arguments.
Joins the specified string arrays.
The array of strings to join.
The separator to use.
The concatenated string.
Processes the specified line from the specified <xref href="System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerResults"></xref>.
A <xref href="System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerResults"></xref> that indicates the results of compilation.
The line to process.
For a description of this member, see <xref href="System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeCompiler.CompileAssemblyFromDom(System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerParameters,System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit)"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeCompiler> instance is cast to an <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeCompiler> interface.
A <xref href="System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerParameters"></xref> object that indicates the compiler options.
A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit"></xref> that indicates the source to compile.
The results of compilation.
options is `null`.

For a description of this member, see <xref href="System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeCompiler.CompileAssemblyFromDomBatch(System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerParameters,System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit[])"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeCompiler> instance is cast to an <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeCompiler> interface.
A <xref href="System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerParameters"></xref> object that indicates the compiler options.
An array of <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit"></xref> objects that indicates the source to compile.
The results of compilation.

It can be used only when the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeCompiler> instance is cast to an <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeCompiler> interface.

The file name to compile.

A <xref href="System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerParameters"></xref> object that indicates the compiler options.
An array of strings that indicates the file names to compile.
The results of compilation.

A string that indicates the source code to compile.
The results of compilation.
